channel.title: [PI]Changing PK point shops back to regular shops
channel.description:
I added all my shops today only to find out that some of them used PK points instead of coins. I've tried working backwards on tutorials but this didn't work .. would anyone have any idea how to do this ?
Regards Nsf

item.title: [PI]Changing PK point shops back to regular shops
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“Say wut?, post:2, topic:402157”]noshit sherlock, don’t use tutorials, learn shit yourself.
ShopAssistant class, look for the shop, look at the codes, if you can’t figure it out,
just quit trying to “program” or whatever you do with the codes.[/quote] I’m pretty sure I’m justified in using 1 tutorial after adding player owned shops, caskets, armour sets and a working DFS from scratch, and more, I’ve tried deleting the ok points price but that just makes it 0

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Changing PK point shops back to regular shops

item.title: [PI]Changing PK point shops back to regular shops
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Say wut?, post:4, topic:402157”]kewl, it’s the gay copy system from here.
not my fault I’ve just joined this site rofl.[/quote]

I’m not saying you sound like a douche because you can’t copy and paste properly. I’m saying you’re a douche because you copy and paste, then people who copy and paste to quit coding.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Changing PK point shops back to regular shops
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Say wut?, post:2, topic:402157”]noshit sherlock, don’t use tutorials, learn shit yourself.
ShopAssistant class, look for the shop, look at the codes, if you can’t figure it out,
just quit trying to “program” or whatever you do with the codes.[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read through the comments on that topic, then think of how much of a douche bag you are.

Anyways, you have to go into shopassistant.java, search for case ####, with #### obviously being the id of the item. Then just delete it.

Read full topic
